Game.Name: Bejeweled 3
Game.Plot: Take the biggest, brightest Bejeweled everywhere you go! Discover all-new ways to play the world’s #1 puzzle game. Find your perfect match with 8 breathtaking game modes that meet all your moods - ease into Classic Bejeweled for cascades of fun, journey through 40 challenging Quest puzzles, charge up in Lightning for non-stop action, and fine-tune your Zen experience for a revolutionary new way to relax. Enjoy the amazing sights and sounds and engage in endless gem-matching fun as you soar to dazzling new heights! • 8 game modes: With so many new ways to play, you’ll find a perfect match for every mood • Stylus control: Make matches quickly and easily with your stylus • Badges: Earn over 60 badges to prove your multifaceted skills • Amazing sights and sounds: Bejeweled is more sparkling than ever
